short_description: Full-service construction firm specializing in custom home remodeling, restoration, new construction, repairs, alterations, and additions. behrconstruction​
long_description: Founded in 1976 by Chris Behr, Behr Construction is a licensed California firm (B409066) recognized as a Top 500 U.S. Remodeling company since 1996. They offer comprehensive services from project planning to completion, with a team boasting over 90 years of combined experience, emphasizing quality craftsmanship, clear communication, and sustainable practices as U.S. Green Building Council members. Projects range from small repairs to multi-million dollar homes across Southern California. behrconstruction+1​
open_hours: Mon-Fri 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM; Closed Sat & Sun behrconstruction​
